chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In this video, I will tell you what are ID and classes.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The concept of ID and classes is one of the concepts that are confused.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In fact, when I was learning HTML in my early days, I was confused in the ID and classes.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: ID means unique identifier.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you give an ID to an element, you will not give it to another element.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But the meaning of the class is that if you want to give multiple elements to a property,

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: you will give it multiple classes.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: For example, you can give a class called red, a div, and a form.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Similarly, you can give an article tag or header tag for the class called bg red.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Do like this video because we will go into the computer screen and we will see these things very closely.

chunks.text: Now if you want to understand ID and classes in the restaurant, then the ID is your identity.

chunks.text: This is Tania's ID.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So can a person have multiple classes?

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: A person can have multiple classes.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: For example, Harry is in the class 10th.

chunks.text: And he goes to a tuition where this class is in class 10A.

chunks.title: Id & Classes in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And one is in class 10A.

chunks.text: And along with that, if you wear Harry's red t-shirt,

chunks.text: You will know that many people will know that.
